promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a massive strong bull fighting-type pokemon wearing a ornate crown. It can be found in canyon-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or bull. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Toronarch, a a massive strong bull fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in canyon-like environments It has the following abilities: Lucha Fight. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "bull", "fighting" or "Toronarch". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, bull-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, orange and blue ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This colossus of strength, found in canyon habitats, delivers seismic blows with Lucha Fight. Known as Toronarch, it charges like the relentless wind.
